name: JustPlayFPS
description:
This zero click multiplayer FPS game.

link to play in the browser

https://justplayfps.avivvexler.online/

When you open a room for the game you can copy some link, and send it to your friends.

When your friend opens the link it just types a nickname and then immediately joins your room.

host instruction:

1)sign in by google

2)open room

3)copy link and send.

4)click play.

player instruction:

1)open link

2)sign in by google or anonymously(first time only)

3)play
